Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for storage capacity, performance, and redundancy. Identify the applications and workloads that will use StorSimple.
Design the storage architecture, including the placement of StorSimple devices, integration with on-premises and cloud environments, and data tiering strategy.
Order the required StorSimple device from Microsoft or an authorized reseller. Ensure the device meets the specifications for the project.
Install and configure the StorSimple device in the designated location. Connect it to the network and ensure proper power and cooling requirements are met.
Set up StorSimple Manager in the Azure portal to manage the StorSimple device. Configure device settings, storage accounts, and policies.
Enable encryption for data at rest and in transit. Configure access controls and ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Perform thorough testing of the storage setup, including data transfer rates, latency, and failover scenarios to ensure the system meets the required specifications.
Set up backup policies and disaster recovery plans for the StorSimple device. Ensure data is replicated to Azure for redundancy.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and StorSimple Manager. Regularly review storage usage and optimize data tiering policies.
Document the storage architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Provide training for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the setup.
Ensure the storage setup meets all regulatory compliance requirements. Implement regular auditing procedures to verify compliance and security postures.
Use Azure Monitor to continuously track the health and status of StorSimple devices. Identify and address any hardware or software anomalies.
Regularly check for and apply firmware updates to StorSimple devices to ensure compatibility and security.
Perform regular checks to ensure backups stored in StorSimple are complete and recoverable.
Review and update access controls for StorSimple devices to ensure compliance with security policies.
Conduct failover and recovery tests to validate disaster recovery configurations and ensure readiness for potential outages.
Analyze storage performance metrics and optimize configurations to ensure efficient use of StorSimple resources.
Regularly rotate encryption keys used for securing data in StorSimple to maintain security best practices.
Monitor and review storage usage trends to plan for capacity upgrades or adjustments.
Update operational documentation for StorSimple devices, including configuration details, troubleshooting guides, and maintenance logs.
Perform regular security audits to ensure StorSimple configurations adhere to organizational and industry standards.
Conduct drills to prepare for potential security incidents or storage outages. Ensure familiarity with response protocols.
Develop and execute plans for upgrading or expanding StorSimple storage capacity as needed.
Ensure the operations team participates in regular training to stay updated with new StorSimple features and best practices.
Regularly back up configurations of StorSimple devices to ensure quick recovery in case of device failure.
Collect and analyze user feedback regarding StorSimple performance and reliability. Implement continuous improvements based on this feedback.
